marklogic.body: It's interesting that a couple of Websites (ESPN being one) have rated the free agent moves of the teams and they gave the Chiefs an A. Apparently they agree the Chiefs made some good moves in the season at O-line, RB, CB, and TE. They cited the QB position as an area of "concern" but said the Chiefs did not have to Reach in the draft and could get the best player available for the draft position. If another team is in love with somebody at 11 I think Pioli has an excellent chance to move back several Spots, pick up some more picks and really build the depth. A QB should be one of the picks if a Weeden or Osweiler is around in the 3rd round.
